strings:
<se_low>Yangus: Our enemy's in Neos, guv.
There ain't no point bein' 'ere now.
Come on!
<se_low>Yangus: I know you're worried about Rolo, but we ain't got time to 'ang around 'ere!
<se_low>Yangus: Anyway, just bein' in this place gives me the willies!

<se_high>Jessica: I don't care how many times he knocks me down, I'll just keep on getting up again!
I'll never give up! Ever!

<se_high>Jessica: <Cap><hero>!
Let's go back to the Holy Isle of Neos!
We have to defeat Rhapthorne!

<se_high>Jessica: So the last heir of the great sages is gone.
And now the world feels so...quiet.
Too quiet, if you ask me.
<se_high>Jessica: I have a horrible feeling that there's unspeakable trouble brewing right now...
<se_def>Angelo: If we let him go now, he'll get himself established as the Lord High Priest.<page>Angelo: His guard will be so tight, we won't stand a chance of getting near him.
<se_def>Angelo: We've got one shot at defeating Marcello, and it's now. Let's go!

<se_def>Angelo: If Marcello is to be inaugurated as the new Lord High Priest, the ceremony will definitely be taking place on the Holy Isle of Neos.<page>Angelo: We should look for him there, not here.
<se_def>Angelo: Come on. Let's get a move on.
<se_high>Jessica: If we don't manage to defeat Rhapthorne, the whole world's going to end up looking like this.

<se_high>Jessica: Monsters as jailers, eternal torment, and only death to free you from the pain...
It's too awful to imagine.

<se_low>Yangus: I wonder wot 'appened to Rolo after we left 'im.
It's a bit of a worry...
<se_low>Yangus: But maybe 'e's better off down there if Rhapthorne starts attackin' us from up above, eh?
<se_def>Angelo: I know you probably want to rescue High Priest Rolo, but we have to prioritise defeating Rhapthorne first.

<se_def>Angelo: Don't worry about it.
If I give it my best shot, we'll take care of him in no time. Trust me!
<se_high>Red: That Marcello didn't look like 'e was bein' controlled like wot the dog was.
<se_high>Red: I'm thinkin' maybe that's 'is true colours, eh? Yeah, 'is true, stark ravin' bonkers colours.
<se_high>Red: I 'ope you ain't forgotten wot old Rolo done for you so ya could escape that filthy nick, eh?
<se_high>Red: He weren't expectin' us to sit around waitin' for 'im! We've gotta find out the truth about wot 'appened to the Lord 'Igh Priest, that's wot we've gotta do.
<se_low>Morrie: Is it the power of the sceptre that is so strong, or the power of signor Marcello...?
<se_low>Morrie: Whatever is the answer, we must be stronger, ay! We must have more POWER, more GUSTO and more PASSION!
<se_low>Morrie: Ragazzo! I have it! I have the answer! The persona who killed the padre was someone who wanted to become the Lord High Priest himself!
<se_low>Morrie: ...Or maybe it was the work of the Rhapthorne, ay? Or MAYBE! Maybe it is some persons working together, hands on hands.
<se_low>Morrie: Hmmm... This is a tough case for the Commissario Mozzarella to crack, ay?
<se_high>Red: If it weren't for Rolo's sacrifice, you lot might not o' got out.
<se_high>Red: We've gotta defeat Rhapthorne before that nutter takes over the 'ole world, or wot old Rolo did's gonna be in vain.
<se_low>Morrie: The cage to under the ground is broken down now. We cannot know what is happening in the depths of the prison.
<se_low>Morrie: But we know what we gotta do, ay? And this is the fastest way to find out how it is down there.
